name: yorkshireman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a man from Yorkshire (= an area of northern England that includes the counties (= areas with their own local government) of North Yorkshire, South Yorkshire, East Yorkshire, and West Yorkshire): As a proud Yorkshireman and Barnsley supporter, I went to the game to cheer on my team. He was a plain-speaking Yorkshireman, and respected for it. Together with a fellow Yorkshire man, he's planning the opening night of a new restaurant in London.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Yorkshireman scored 50 runs in his first innings for the county team.He will be remembered as a proud Yorkshire man who remained so, despite living in the United States for much of his life. He has written a book about the 50 greatest Yorkshire men and women of all time.
